_sText:
A revision with all the requests of my aim_texture_housebattle, all the bugs are fixed too, even the famous terrorist side "the hole" lol.

list of (requested) revisions.

1.pools in back of houses for easy route off of the roof

2.buyzone in center

3.made the CT's house a lighter blue for easier shooting through the windows

4. made the path up to the roof easier on ct side, a little harder on t side so now its even :)

5. added another window on t's house

6.added a quite a few more brushes, as you can see from the 1st screenie =)

and thats about it! hope you all enjoy it as much as the first one.

also, play it at FTS clan server it is in rotation there =)

edit-i have also improved the fps times by about 30!

edit2-BE SURE TO CHANGE THE MAP NAME TO aim_texture_housebattle_revis because the name is too long for servers.. sorry folks =)
